title._content: Image taken from page 457 of 'The Great Salt Lake Trail'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Great Salt Lake Trail" Author: INMAN, Henry - and CODY (William Frederick) Contributor: CODY, William Frederick - called Buffalo Bill Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10413.d.10.", "British Library DSC MFE33/04016 *1*" Page: 457 Place of Publishing: New York Date of Publishing: 1898 Publisher: Macmillan Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001801888 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here. Please note that you will need to enter details from the above list - such as the shelfmark, the page, the book's volume and so on - when filling out your order. Following this or the link above will take you to the British Library's integrated catalogue. You will be able to download a PDF of the book this image is taken from, as well as view the pages up close with the 'itemViewer'.
